Translations.Text: Habet they non deserved deus retribution de repelling others Sanctus Masjid et though they non est custos thereof? true custos thereof est righteous multus de them non know
Their Contact Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) est non multus than mockery means repelling people crowding them out)! Ergo suffer retribution tuus disbelief
Those disbelieve spend their moneta repel others via DEUS. They spend it tunc it turn into sorrow remorse them. Ultimately they defeated totus disbelievers summoned to Hell
DEUS testimentum sift away MALUS EX BONUS TUNC pile MALUS on top de each alius TOTUS in 1 pile TUNC throw it Hell! Such est losers
Tell those disbelieved they stop totus their elapsus forgiven! Autem si they return they incur same fate prout their proximus counterparts
Vos fight them ward oppression practice tuus religionis devoted to DEUS alone they refrain aggression tunc DEUS est fully Seer de everything they perfecit
they turn tunc vos know ut DEUS est tuus Dominus Magister; bonus Dominus Magister bene supporter
